turtles.name: Leonardo
funFacts: Named after Leonardo da Vinci
Always tries to keep the team together
Often takes responsibility for his brothers

turtles.name: Michelangelo
funFacts: Named after Michelangelo Buonarroti
Loves pizza more than anything
Has a pet turtle named Klunk

turtles.name: Donatello
funFacts: Named after Donatello di Niccol√≤
Builds most of the team's gadgets and vehicles
Loves to experiment with technology

turtles.name: Raphael
funFacts: Named after Raffaello Sanzio
Has a soft spot for animals, especially his pet turtle Spike
Often clashes with Leonardo over leadership

allies.name: Splinter
funFacts: Originally a human named Hamato Yoshi
Raised the Turtles from infancy and trained them in ninjutsu

allies.name: April O'Neil
funFacts: Close friend and ally of the Turtles
Often helps them with gathering information and uncovering villains' plans

allies.name: Casey Jones
funFacts: Wields various sports equipment as weapons
Has a close friendship with Raphael

villains.name: Shredder
funFacts: Leader of the Foot Clan
Sworn enemy of Splinter and the Turtles
Constantly tries to dominate New York City

villains.name: Krang
funFacts: Krang is a brain-like alien who controls a large robotic body
Wants to conquer Earth with Shredder's help

villains.name: Bebop
funFacts: Was originally a human gang member
Mutated by Shredder to serve as muscle

villains.name: Rocksteady
funFacts: Mutated from a human into a rhinoceros
Works alongside Bebop, though they're both often incompetent
